title: Elise Graves Interaction
body: I was playing Elise the other day and noticed that when I repelled on a graves smoke screen I was still blinded by the smoke screen. This is only a minor detail but I don't think I should be blinded by something on the ground when I am way above it. This also really messed with the functionality of the e as I wasn't able to pick a target to jump to because of the blind.

replies.body: I think it's just because Elise's model is still in the AOE of the smokescreen. I agree it should be changed, that and Yasuo's interaction with Poppy and Nautilus' ults.
Yasuo's wind wall blocks projectiles. I don't think subsurface abilities count (poppy/naut ult)

Projectile = Projectile. No way around it. Above, below, through the shadow realm, doesn't matter. Poppy gets blocked.

However, Naut ult is not a projecitile.

It should follow that logic, then.

Nautilus' ult is a wave/geyser coming from below and Poppy's ult is a shockwave that comes from below. Yet, one gets a pass and the latter gets blocked because...?

Nautilus ult just isn't a projectile. It's not a shock**wave** it's a series of intermittent explosions in the direction of the target.

It's just not coded as one. *There's no moving projectile*.
It's how Nauts ult is coded, it creates explosions at set intervals towards the targeted champion.

Except Game wise, it's still *a projectile*. Realistically, Tristana should jump over abilities and ground AOEs, but she still get's hit because there is no Z axis. There is no such thing as a subsurface ability in terms of a game term. It's a projectile, the animation just isn't of one.
If there was, {{champion:421}} would be immune to everything that wasn't a subsurface ability in her E lol
Oh god.
Yeah, as Academy Kayn said, both of those subsurface/non-projectile ultimates are still classified as projectiles and get blocked by windwall.
ever try to Gnar hop over cait/jinx traps?
This man is a prophet, i agree 100%. Anything to mess with graves.

I think the same thing.. please give Elise some quality of life buffs to her E. One thing that always bothered me was the fact that champs like sej, can dash though any wall, but Elise cant repel over it without a target? guess it would make it to op? but yea please give her rapel some buffs so I can at least see in graves blind thing. Would be helpful

league has no z axis, therefore you were never "above" it, its just a visual animation.

hence why things up in the air can still be hit by cc, like tristana jump.

There is no such thing as "above," and you were still in the smokescreen, just untargetable. And he didn't target you; you were just in a low-visibility area. This is similar to if someone used Ignite on you before you rappelled: you would go untargetable, but you would still be on fire.

yea its the main reason graves kinda counters Elise. If he put the screen in the middle, it treats if as you're in that location and blinded by it, much like fizz shouldn't have full vision when he uses E in the smoke or if you zhonya's inside it. Elise visually goes up but in reality her position is the exact same due to no Y axis in league (much like trist can't jump over cait traps), there's not jumps or leaps its just simply "untargetability" and blinds aren't canceled by it.

But hey, at least volatile spiderling ignores windwall so its not all bad.
